import ImagePreview from "../components/ImagePreview";

export const ImagePreviewDemo = () => {
  return (
    <div>
      <ImagePreview
        width={300}
        src="https://zos.alipayobjects.com/rmsportal/jkjgkEfvpUPVyRjUImniVslZfWPnJuuZ.png"
      />
      <ImagePreview
        width={300}
        alt="data:image/png;base64,"
      />
    </div>
  );
};

## ğŸ’¡ ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³•

```tsx
import ImagePreview from "../components/ImagePreview";

export const ImagePreviewDemo = () => {
  return (
      <ImagePreview
        width={300}
        src="https://zos.alipayobjects.com/rmsportal/jkjgkEfvpUPVyRjUImniVslZfWPnJuuZ.png"
      />
      <ImagePreview
        width={300}
        alt="data:image/png;base64,"
      />
  );
};
```
